messages.title: STOP BREXIT. BUILD A BRIGHTER FUTURE
messages.content: People are fed up with the Brexit chaos. It has become a national embarrassment.

messages.title: Winning Here
messages.content: Swinson's Liberal Democrats to take second Tory seat or Labour is just reinforcing the Brexit block.

messages.title: FREE CHILDCARE AND A FAIRER ECONOMY
messages.content: Families are working harder than ever but too many are struggling to get by.

messages.title: THE LIB DEM PLAN
messages.content: Build a fairer economy by providing free childcare from 9 months and deliver a £10,000 to spend on skills and training throughout their lives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit and invest the Remain Bonus in public services like our NHS and schools.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Free Childcare and a Fairer Economy
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Provide free childcare from 9 months and help parents return to work and unlock their untapped potential for our economy.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Swinson's Liberal Democrats to take second Tory seat or Labour is just reinforcing the Brexit block.

endorsements.endorsement: I used to vote Conservative, now I'm voting Lib Dem

quotes.text: The Lib Dem fightback is real - and it's changing everything.
I'm leaving the Tories and voting Lib Dem... Boris Johnson has sold every voter down the river with his fatal Tory Brexit blow to the British economy.
Boris Johnson is a compulsive liar who has betrayed every single person he has ever had any dealings with.
Boris Johnson facing Lib Dems surge.

images.caption: Liberal Democrats rally with Jo Swinson holding 'Stop Brexit' signs
Comparison between Trump, Johnson, and Farage implying Brexit collaboration
